name: pillar (itch) (Tyst)
description:
Collect souls and the weaponry of the enemies that dared to stand on the way of your army. Fight, craft, collect and dominate in this simple strategy autobattler, where you have to control and manage small army that will only grow, until nothing in depths of the earth will be able to stand on it's way.

Use mouse for controls, mechanics explained in the Wall of text How to play.

Disclaimer
The game is unbalanced in every possible way, and most of the skills don't have distinct visual representation, I'm sorry for that.
